name: with multiple
requests:
  - method: GET
    url: https://api.nowhere.com/v1/items/1234
  - method: GET
    url: https://api.nowhere.com/v1/items/1234
    noRedirect: true
  - method: GET
    url: https://api.elsehwere.new/users/1
    responseFile: response.200.json
  - headers:
      Accept:
        - application/json
      Content-Type:
        - application/json
      User-Agent:
        - go.followtheprocess.codes/zap test
      X-Custom-Header:
        - "yes"
    method: GET
    url: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1
  - method: DELETE
    url: https://somewhere.org/api
    timeout: 15s
    connectionTimeout: 1s
  - method: POST
    url: https://somewhere.org/api/items/1
    body:
      - 123
      - 34
      - 115
      - 116
      - 117
      - 102
      - 102
      - 34
      - 58
      - 34
      - 104
      - 101
      - 114
      - 101
      - 34
      - 125
  - method: POST
    url: https://somewhere.org/api/items/1
    bodyFile: a/file.txt
  - method: GET
    url: https://api.elsehwere.new/users/1
    responseFile: response.200.json
